<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81795</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81795</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4274</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Word Rhythms</string>
            <string language="es">Ritmos de palabras</string>
            <string language="ga">Rithimí Focail</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wort-Rhythmen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rythmes de Mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ritmos Da Palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ritmi Di Parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρυθμοί λέξης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Experimentation with the natural rhythms of local or national place names, combining them to make a composition.</string>
            <string language="es">Experimentación con los ritmos naturales de nombres locales o nacionales, combinándolos para hacer una composición.</string>
            <string language="ga">Turgnaíocht le rithimí nádúrtha atá ag ainmneacha áitiúla nó náisiúnta, á meascadh chun rithim a chumadh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experimentieren mit den natürlichen Rhythmen der 
lokalen oder nationalen Ortsnamen, sie kombinierend, um einen Aufbau 
zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérimentation avec les rythmes normaux des noms
de lieu locaux ou nationaux, les combinant pour faire une composition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experimentação com os ritmos naturais de nomes 
de lugar locais ou nacionais, combinando os para fazer uma 
composição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento con i ritmi naturali dei nomi di luogo
locali o nazionali, unente li per fare una composizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πειραματισμός με τους φυσικούς ρυθμούς των τοπικών ή 
εθνικών ονομάτων θέσεων, που συνδυάζουν τους για να κάνει μια 
σύνθεση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
